item.title: Version 1.6.0
item.description:
Changes

  • Updated to Oculus SDK 1.31
  • Added input bindings for Knuckles based on ShadowBrain's community bindings

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed wireless adapter users encountering constant reprojection (#1079)
  • Revive: Fixed Xbox controller input not working (#1064)
  • Revive: Removed Oculus Avatar Editor, it no longer exists as a standalone app (#1097)
  • Revive: Fixed invisible main menu in Dirt Rally when using motion smoothing (#1086)
